changeSet.author: Yash

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'Maxwell Madyauta', 'Gift Njoboyenkosi', 'Christina Manjena', 'Enock Mupomi', 'Gloria Sezere', 'Vaida Mavhatu', 'Sikholiwe Kuture', 'Edward Sengai', 'Matilda Chitsungo', 'Ernest Nyabasa', 'Acquilina Mavengano', 'Pardon Mukakaso', 'Luckson Chatora', 'Beverley Mhukayatadza', 'Dr Ratidzai Sarai', 'Takaruda' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" ) AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counselling");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Provider name for "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counselling"
